thread.title: Southern California Orthopedic Institute welcomes Dr. Brian Dierckman — 4 observations
thread.title_full: Southern California Orthopedic Institute welcomes Dr. Brian Dierckman — 4 observations

author: mrechtoris@beckershealthcare.com (Mary Rechtoris)
title: Southern California Orthopedic Institute welcomes Dr. Brian Dierckman — 4 observations
text:
Southern California Orthopedic Institute welcomes Dr. Brian Dierckman — 4 observations Written by Mary Rechtoris | Wednesday, 07   
Brian Dierckman, MD, joined Southern California Orthopedic Institute and will see patients at the Valencia and Van Nuys locations, according to The Santa Clarita Valley Signal. 
Here are four observations: 

1. Dr. Dierckman is a sports medicine physician who specializes in diagnosing and treating orthopedic sports injuries and conditions. 

2. He earned his medical degree from Indiana University School of Medicine in Indianapolis. 

3. After obtaining his medical degree, Dr. Dierckman underwent his orthopedic surgery residency at Emory University in Atlanta and completed his fellowship at Southern California Orthopedic Institute. 

4. Southern California Orthopedic Institute is one of the largest private orthopedic practices on West Coast.
